pages.text: Pristerognathus is a therocephalian from the Middle Permian period. It was a predator with large canines and it was about the size of a dog, reaching 1.5 meters in length. Its fossils have been discovered in South Africa and they likely lived in wooded areas and preyed on smaller therapsids of the time.
